name: Tic Tac Toe LOUNGE
description: The coolest, most entertaining and smartest version of Tic Tac Toe you'll find!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel / AMD Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX Storage: 135 MB available space Sound Card: Recommended
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 8 / Windows 10 Processor: Intel / AMD Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX Storage: 135 MB available space Sound Card: Recommended
